item.title: The Utilities Stock at the Center of AI and Rising Electric Bills
item.description: AI data centers are causing American’s utility bills to soar. As demand continues to surge, utility companies will reap the benefits.

item.title: Oracle Has Spoken: AI Changes Everything
item.description: Oracle is on track to rise above $400 as AI and hyperscaler data center demand drive a ballooning RPO and revenue growth outlook.

item.title: Beyond DIY: Home Depot's Conquest of the Professional Market
item.description: Home Depot’s massive acquisitions of SRS and GMS forge a new B2B titan, aiming to dominate every phase of the professional construction project.

item.title: 3 Plays on Gold in Case Trust in the Fed Slips
item.description: With the price of gold already rallying and set to jump even further, these three investments could set investors up to reap big rewards.

item.title: CoreWeave and Madrigal's Insider Trades Flash Bullish Signals
item.description: Insider trades at NVIDIA-backed CoreWeave and Madrigal Pharmaceuticals are bullish indicators, but for very different reasons.
